description.value:
You briefly split your personal timeline into three paths. As part of casting this spell, you make a melee or ranged attack. Make the attack roll three times, note each roll’s result, and use the highest. If at least two of the attack rolls would successfully hit the target, your attack ignores all miss chance caused by concealment and total concealment, and your attack also applies the weapon’s critical hit effect (if any), though the attack does not deal double damage. If all three attacks would hit the target, then treat the attack as a critical hit. If you make this attack with a weapon that affects an area or multiple targets, the spell’s additional benefits apply only to the closest target.

Casting this spell doesn’t provoke attacks of opportunity.
